Subbed Projects.Show Name: Dr. Slump Movie 01: Arale-chan Hello! Fushigi Shima

Good Comments: Good subs, great video quality and the only group actively subbing this show
beautiful encode of a classic show that should be more widely recognized!
Great translation, keeps the feel of the original. Does a good job of explaining any of the pun-style jokes, and does it quickly so you don't have to pause the video to read the explanation.
Bad Comments: Good, clean, and nice quality while subbing the episodes.
They provide explanation for the jokes which would otherwise go over my head as I do not understand Japanese culture
